question: Which Indian wrestler was recently inducted in the governmentâ€™s All India Council of Sports (AICS)?
explanation:
The Ministry of Youth affairs and Sports has recently reconstituted the advisory body, All India Council of Sports (AICS) and extended the tenure of the body to three years. V. K. Malhotra remains the President of the Council.
The number of members of the advisory body was reduced to 18 from the original count of 27. The new inductees to the council are wrestler Yogeshwar Dutt, Paralympian Deepa Malik and Mountaineer Bachendri Pal among others. The names of notable sportspersons which were omitted include Bhaichung Bhutia, Sachin Tendulkar, Viswanathan Anand and P Gopichand.
